information: The company LIPPOLT GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1902, which operates in the Water - production and distribution industry. It also operates in the Agricultural systems and equipment, Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment, Tractors and trailers, agricultural, and Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment industries. It is based in Weidenberg, Germany.
